items.name: balloons
items.description: This pack contains 15 red latex balloons. WARNING: choking hazard - children under 8 can choke or suffocate on uninflated or broken balloons. Adult supervision required. Helium not included.

items.name: bendy_straws
items.description: 80 count of neon colored bendy straws with longer flex

items.name: black_fashion_gloves
items.description: Authentic FOMANN gloves in retail packaging. One size fits most Teens(Age 15 and up), Mens and Ladies. Soft and comfortable, superior quality gloves. Good for field works & outdoor sports and winter gloves. Fibers Blend

items.name: circular_cake_pans
items.description: 9-inch diameter cake pan, 1.5-inch deep, matte silver, not wrapped.

items.name: colgate_toothbrush_4pk
items.description: Colgate Circular Power Bristles Toothbrushes Medium - 4 PK. Circular power bristles, Cleaning tip bristles, Helps remove tooth stains, Easy-to-grip handle.

items.name: composition_book
items.description: Composition books are a necessity when it comes to school supplies! This composition book is 1 subject, college and Wide Ruled, with 100 sheets/book. 15 lb. paper and 30 pt backing. Heavy-duty pressboard covers withstand regular use and the book has sewn binding.

items.name: crayons
items.description: Great for use at home or school, Crayola Crayons are an essential creative tool for kids. This pack of 24 non-toxic crayons contains classic colors as well as bright, fun shades to inspire self-expression and imaginative play. Plus, Crayola Crayons can last 35 percent longer. Vibrant, High-Quality Results. Crayola Crayons provide color-loving kids with 24 hues that feature vibrant, long-lasting color. Amp up school projects and artistic endeavors with high-quality results. The variety of bright colors in this pack invites imaginative expression. 24 Classic and Fun Colors. Kids will love to use these vividly colored, durable crayons at home or at school. Small enough to fit in a book bag, this portable box is large enough to hold a wide variety of colors. In addition to classic Crayola colors, this 24-count box contains fun shades such as carnation pink, dandelion, indigo, and scarlet, so you can mix and match to create colorful drawings and bold signs. Durable, Long-Lasting Crayons. Crayola Crayons can last 35 percent longer, based on square foot coverage against key competitors. Children can enjoy drawing more pictures and filling coloring books even longer. About Crayola: Art and Imagination. Crayola art supplies and activities help children express, create, and connect through colorful play. Package Contents: Crayola Crayons, 24 Count.

items.name: disney_princess_journal
items.description: This is a mostly pink journal with three Disney Princesses on the cover, Belle, Cinderella, and Rapunzel. It is hard covered with a lock on the side. It measures 8.25 by 5.25 inches and has 120 sheets.

items.name: dove_soap
items.description: small white cardboard box. Contains a bar of soap that has enough room to bounce from side to side within box

items.name: duct_tape
items.description: Scotch(R) Cloth Tape is a general purpose cloth tape. It is intended for bundling, sealing, and holding applications. Great in the home and office. General purpose duct tape. For bundling. For sealing. For holding applications in the home and office.

items.name: expo_eraser
items.description: Soft pile felt eraser quickly removes marks on any whiteboard, porcelain or melamine surface. Non-abrasive material erases cleanly without scratching. Washable - simply use soap and water to clean. Expo Whiteboard Dry Erase Board Soft Pile Eraser, 5 1/8-inch, 1-count.

items.name: great_value_dishwasher_packets
items.description: white blue and green plastic bag holds 20 dishwasher packets. They are tightly packed but still move a little within the bag. The bag has a resealable flap at the top. It measure 8.5 by 6 inches.

items.name: hinged_ruled_index_cards
items.description: 50 multicolored, 3x5 inch note cards. Printer/Copier Paper. Held together with metal spiral ring.

items.name: ice_cube_tray
items.description: Sterilite Ice Cube Tray 1-pk - White. The durable, yet flexible ice cube trays allows ice cubes to release with an easy twist. The ice trays stack securely without sticking and are designed to channel water so trays fill quickly. Each tray makes 16 nice-sized ice cubes. FLEXIBLE AND DURABLE: Ice cubes release easily with just a twist. STACKABLE: Trays stack easily and neatly in the freezer without sticking. Features: BPA-free. Material: Plastic. Care and Cleaning: Freezer Safe, Dishwasher-safe. Number of cavities: 16.

items.name: laugh_out_loud_jokes
items.description: What happens to race car drivers when they eat too much? They get indy-gestion. Laugh-Out-Loud Jokes for Kids provides children ages 7-10 many hours of fun and laughter. Young readers will have a blast sharing this collection of hundreds of one-liners, knock knock jokes, tongue twisters, and more with their friends and family This brand new book will have children rolling on the floor with laughter and is sure to be a great gift idea for any child.

items.name: listerine
items.description: 500 mL bottle of listerine. Teal coloured antiseptic mouthwash in a rectangular shaped bottle.

items.name: marbles
items.description: Ashland Decorative Fillers, Mini Marbles. Smaller than your average sized marble, these shiny gems are sure to add reflection and sparkle to any arrangement. They're perfect for use as vase filler or elements in mosaic projects or mixed media crafts! Details: 12 oz. (340.1 g), 100% silica glass.

items.name: measuring_spoons
items.description: Precision and style blend together to enhance your cooking with this Stainless Steel Mixing Measuring Spoon Set. An essential utensil for any chef, this Measuring Spoon Set is made of gorgeous and sturdy stainless steel so it's easy to clean and adds sharp appeal to your kitchen decor. The measurements are carved into the handles to make the Spoons easy to read. Including a teaspoon, tablespoon, 1/4 teaspoon and 1/2 teaspoon, this Set ensures your recipes come out just right.

items.name: mesh_strainer
items.description: 6 inch  MAINSTAYS strainer with black easy grip handle and heavy-duty rust resistant silver mesh. Not wrapped

items.name: mouse_traps
items.description: The Tomcat Mouse Trap (Wooden) is the pesticide-free way to control mice. It can be used with Tomcat Mouse Attractant Gel to attract mice. You can rely on this economical, easy-to-use trap to help you exterminate your mouse infestation.

items.name: mouth_guard_case
items.description: Flat back made out of plastic. Red/Black cardboard insert describing the producted, located in the packaging. Roughly ½ of the front side is an extruded square were the product is located. The case is white with black lettering.

items.name: number_flash_cards
items.description: yellow cardboard box. It is short in height and lightweight.

items.name: paper_napkins
items.description: 50 count of white 32cm x 32cm 2-ply napkins. Each square napkin has floral printing

items.name: plastic_wine_glass
items.description: CreativeWare 12oz. Acrylic Wine Glass - Clear. This wine glass is the perfect addition to your party. Clear, sturdy, and elegent, your guests will enjoy their drink of choice in style. For some celebrations, glass-breaking is a must. For all others, the must is this CreativeWare 12oz. Acrylic Wine Glass - Clear. Crafted with durable clear acrylic material that can withstand bumps and drops, this product is ideal for casual or outdoor gatherings. The classic shape is great for serving both white and red wines.

items.name: poland_spring_water
items.description: Sourced from carefully selected springs in Maine since 1845, POLAND SPRING spring water contains naturally occurring minerals for a crisp, refreshing taste. 100% natural spring water. Zero calories, no sweeteners and no artificial colors or flavors. Contains naturally balanced minerals for a crisp, refreshing taste. Every bottle is 100% recyclable (excluding label and cap).

items.name: promarx_pens
items.description: flat piece of blue cardboard holds three average sized pens of different colors. The pens are centered on the cardboard with a lot of extra room on the sides but are held snug and enclosed in a hard plastic shell

items.name: red_decorative_shred
items.description: a mostly clear plastic bag with a white and purple logo on the top holds 2 ounces of red shred. The bag is not easily compressed due to all the air within. It measures 7 by 9.5 inches.

items.name: scotties_tissues
items.description: this is a white blue and green colored box. It is made of a thin/light cardboard and has 120 sheets of tissues inside. It is lightweight.

items.name: smurf_hat
items.description: white flat soft hat made from 100% polyester. The bottom of the hat opens  to fit a head and there is a hook like shape to the top of the hat

items.name: super_washable_markers
items.description: short yellow box holding 10 thick markers of different colors. The markers are tightly packed and don’t move at all within the box. There is an opening on the front face of the box so that the markers are exposed.

items.name: ticonderoga_pencils
items.description: Ticonderoga #2 Wooden Pencils, 2.2mm, 12ct. When you're taking a test, trust Ticonderoga 12ct Wooden Pencils no.2. Everyone knows that some tests simply require a No. 2 pencil and when you need it you select 'The World's Best Pencil,' Ticonderoga. Tried and true and a time-tested favorite, this pencil will get you through with one less worry on test day. Package Quantity: 12. Includes: Pencil. Lead Size: 2.2mm. Lead Type: no. 2. Features: Low-odor, Non-toxic. Suggested Age: 3 Years and Up.

items.name: vinyl_liner
items.description: a one foot long tube of white vinyl liner with brown flowers on it. It is wrapped around a cardboard tube to hold its shape and has a diameter of about 1.5 inches. There is also a white and purple sticker around the middle of the tube that is over 6 inches in length.
